languages.text: "Ну, {mf|господин|госпожа} фон Валанциус, теперь все в ваших руках. Я не сыщик и не знаю, что делать со всеми этими догадками. Если у вас есть мысли, где может быть Фиделио — разыщите ее. Если нет — возвращайтесь ко мне. Нам все-таки надо отправить Денза в последний путь — и решить вопрос с его наследством".

"Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."
languages.original_text: "Ну, {mf|господин|госпожа} фон Валанциус, теперь все в ваших руках. Я не сыщик и не знаю, что делать со всеми этими догадками. Если у вас есть мысли, где может быть Фиделио — разыщите ее. Если нет — возвращайтесь ко мне. Нам все-таки надо отправить Денза в последний путь — и решить вопрос с его наследством".

traits.locale_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his inheritance."

"Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his inheritance."

"Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

"Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

"Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

languages.text: “好了，冯·瓦兰修斯大人，你已经掌握了所有的线索。我并不是侦探，也不知道该怎么处理这些线索。如果你对菲迪奥的下落有什么想法的话，去找到她吧。如果没有，就回来找我吧。无论怎样，我们都要送丹兹上路，处理好他的遗产。”
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: “好了，冯·瓦兰修斯大人，你已经掌握了所有的线索。我并不是侦探，也不知道该怎么处理这些线索。如果你对菲迪奥的下落有什么想法的话，去找到她吧。如果没有，就回来找我吧。无论怎样，我们都要送丹兹上路，处理好他的遗产。”

languages.text: «Bueno, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius, ahora todo está en sus manos. Yo no soy detective; no veo adónde conducen estas pistas. Si tiene alguna idea sobre el paradero de Fidelio, encuéntrela. Si no, vuelva conmigo. Aún tenemos que enviar a Denz a su último viaje... y tratar el asunto de su herencia».
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, {mf|lord|lady} von Valancius, ahora todo está en sus manos. Yo no soy detective; no veo adónde conducen estas pistas. Si tiene alguna idea sobre el paradero de Fidelio, encuéntrela. Si no, vuelva conmigo. Aún tenemos que enviar a Denz a su último viaje... y tratar el asunto de su herencia».

languages.text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下、この件はあなたにお任せします。私は探偵ではありませんし、手がかりがあったところで何を調べればよいのかもわかりません。フィデリオの居場所について心当たりがあるなら、彼女を見つけてください。なければ私のところに戻ってきてください。まだデンツを火葬場に送り、彼の邸宅の処理もしなければならないので」
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: 「フォン・ヴァランシウス陛下、この件はあなたにお任せします。私は探偵ではありませんし、手がかりがあったところで何を調べればよいのかもわかりません。フィデリオの居場所について心当たりがあるなら、彼女を見つけてください。なければ私のところに戻ってきてください。まだデンツを火葬場に送り、彼の邸宅の処理もしなければならないので」

languages.text: "Nun, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, damit liegt alles in Euren Händen. Ich bin kein Detektiv und weiß nichts mit all diesen Hinweisen anzufangen. Falls Ihr eine Idee zu Fidelios Aufenthaltsort habt – findet sie. Falls nicht, kommt wieder her. Wir müssen noch Denz auf die Reise schicken – und die Sache mit seinem Nachlass klären."
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: "Nun, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, damit liegt alles in Euren Händen. Ich bin kein Detektiv und weiß nichts mit all diesen Hinweisen anzufangen. Falls Ihr eine Idee zu Fidelios Aufenthaltsort habt – findet sie. Falls nicht, kommt wieder her. Wir müssen noch Denz auf die Reise schicken – und die Sache mit seinem Nachlass klären."

languages.text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius, tout repose entre vos mains. Je ne suis pas détective et j'ignore quoi faire de toutes ces informations. Si vous avez une idée de l'endroit où se cache Fidélio, trouvez-la. Sinon, revenez me voir. Nous devons toujours terminer les funérailles de Denz et régler l'histoire de sa succession. »
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: « Eh bien, {mf|seigneur|dame} von Valancius, tout repose entre vos mains. Je ne suis pas détective et j'ignore quoi faire de toutes ces informations. Si vous avez une idée de l'endroit où se cache Fidélio, trouvez-la. Sinon, revenez me voir. Nous devons toujours terminer les funérailles de Denz et régler l'histoire de sa succession. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius, artık her şey sizin elinizde. Ben ne hafiyelikten anlarım ne de bu ipuçlarıyla ne yapacağımı bilirim. Fidelio'nun nerede olabileceği hakkında bir fikriniz varsa onu bulun. Bulamazsanız da tekrar yanıma gelin. Hâlâ Denz'i son yolculuğuna uğurlamamız ve mal varlığı konusunu çözmemiz gerekiyor."
languages.original_text: "Well, {mf|Lord|Lady} von Valancius, now it's all in your hands. I'm no sleuth and don't know what to do with all these clues. If you have some thoughts about Fidelio's whereabouts — find her. If not, come back to me. We still need to send Denz on his way — and deal with the matter of his estate."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} von Valancius, artık her şey sizin elinizde. Ben dedektiflik işlerinden anlamam ve bu ipuçlarıyla ne yapacağımı bilmem. Fidelio'nun nerede olabileceği hakkında bir fikriniz varsa onu bulun. Bulamazsanız tekrar yanıma gelin. Hâlâ Denz'i son yolculuğuna uğurlamamız ve mal varlıkları konusunu çözmemiz gerekiyor."
